alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:46PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Slippery Evening Commute Likely... Current radar, webcams, and surface observations indicate a band of light to moderate snow is expanding across the St Lawrence Valley and southern Champlain Valley. This will continue to move into the central and northern Champlain Valley and northern St Lawrence Valley over the next 1 to 3 hours. Surface visibilities will drop below 1 mile at times and roads will become quickly snow covered, resulting in a hazardous and slippery evening commute. Please be alert to changing conditions and give yourself extra time to reach your destination. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions.. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin; Western Rutland
